NL Question: How many OSMWay nodes are connected to OSMNode nodes?
Cypher: MATCH (w:OSMWay)-[:FIRST_NODE]->(wn:OSMWayNode)-[:NODE]->(n:OSMNode) RETURN count(DISTINCT w) AS NumberOfOSMWaysConnectedToOSMNodes;

NL Question: How many OSMTags nodes have the property 'playground' set to 'swing'?
Cypher: MATCH (t:OSMTags) WHERE t.playground = 'swing' RETURN COUNT(t) AS TagCount;
